item.title: Products
item.description:
Products

We make tools for people who care about tone. Software now, hardware soon.

Software

PedalKernel Free

$0 — VST3 Plugin

The essentials. Three core effects (Overdrive, Fuzz, Delay) with standard controls. Perfect for trying us out or if you just need solid tones without the deep tweaking.

  • Overdrive, Fuzz, Delay
  • Standard parameter controls
  • VST3 for macOS, Windows, Linux
  • Community support

Download Free →

PedalKernel Pro (Guitar)

$49 — VST3 Plugin License

item.title: Thank You!
item.description:
Thank You!

Your purchase of PedalKernel Pro is complete.

What happens next:

  1. Check your email for your license key
  2. Download the plugin from the link in that email
  3. Install in your VST3 plugins folder
  4. Start making music

Need help?

Email us: hello@pedalkernel.com

We’re a small team in Seattle, so we might not reply instantly — but we will reply.

← Back to PedalKernel Pro
